Traits.Name: Ancient Insight
Traits.Content: The Crouching Elder can read the thoughts of creatures within 30 feet of it. It can choose to gain advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks against these creatures.

Traits.Name: Cloaking Presence
Traits.Content: The Crouching Elder has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while crouched, allowing it to blend in seamlessly with its surroundings.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Crouching Elder's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells: At will: mage hand, minor illusion. 2/day each: disguise self, detect thoughts.

Actions.Name: Thoughtful Strike
Actions.Content: The Crouching Elder makes two psychic strikes. Each attack is a melee spell attack with a +5 to hit, dealing 14 (3d8 + 3) psychic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Whispering Confusion
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw or become confused until the end of its next turn, acting as if under the effects of the confusion spell.

Actions.Name: Soul Drain
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The Crouching Elder regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

Actions.Name: Phantom's Grasp
Actions.Content: The Crouching Elder conjures ghostly hands that reach for a target within 30 feet. Each creature in a 15-foot radius must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (6d6) psychic damage and be restrained until the end of their next turn. This ability recharges on a roll of 5 or 6 on a d6.
